Package com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services

Class SeatServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.flightbookings.flight_bookings.services.SeatServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
SeatService
@Service public class SeatServiceImpl extends Object implements SeatService
Implementation of the SeatService interface for managing seat operations.
